findings.title: Reentrancy when updating Pyth price-feeds through `PerpsV2ExchangeRate`
findings.description: When the `PerpsV2ExchangeRate.updatePythPrice()` function is called from `PerpsV2MarketDelayedOrders._executeDelayedOrder()`, the ETH amount in `msg.value` is not forwarded to the exchange rate contract.

findings.title: Slippage protection not enforced on short trades
findings.description: Users could set a slippage limit when creating, deleting, or modifying positions to ensure they received an acceptable price. However, the logic does not consider the direction of the trade (long or short) when calculating and asserting the slippage price limit.
